mapper.select: SELECT ca_no, ca_nm, ca_mng, ca_mng_ph, ca_bsns_num FROM CM_ACCOUNT WHERE CA_TYP = '매입처' ORDER BY ca_no

SELECT ca_no, ca_nm, ca_mng, ca_mng_ph, ca_bsns_num FROM CM_ACCOUNT WHERE CA_TYP = '매입처'
AND ca_no LIKE '%' || #{caNo} || '%'
AND ca_nm LIKE '%' || #{caNm} || '%'
ORDER BY ca_no

SELECT cmm_cd, cmm_nm, cmm_typ, cmm_spec, cmm_unit, cmm_saf_stc FROM CM_MTRL_MNG cmm JOIN CM_ACCOUNT ca ON cmm.ca_no = ca.ca_no WHERE 1 = 1
AND ca_nm LIKE '%' || #{caNm} || '%'
AND cmm_nm LIKE '%' || #{cmmNm} || '%'
ORDER BY cmm_cd

SELECT mo_cd, mo_title, mo_reo_dt, mo.ca_no, ca_nm, mo.cmm_cd, mo_dlv_dt FROM MTRL_ORDR mo JOIN CM_MTRL_MNG cmm ON mo.cmm_cd = cmm.cmm_cd JOIN CM_ACCOUNT ca ON cmm.ca_no = ca.ca_no WHERE mo.cmm_cd = #{cmmCd}
